sentences.en: A minor diplomatic kerfuffle ensued as it turned out the cream was being illegally imported from Vietnam.
sentences.cn: 随后就引发一场小型外交动乱，因为美白乳是从越南非法进口的。

sentences.en: Amid all the kerfuffle around Kosovo's declaration of independence, few have paused to note what an extraordinary document it is.
sentences.cn: 在科索沃宣告独立所引起的一片混乱中，很少有人注意到这份独立宣言是多么不同寻常的文件：其中充斥着条件、责任和保留意见。

sentences.en: But the lifecycle for a blog-related kerfuffle is a few days in general, and the blogosphere as a whole has an extreme attention deficit disorder.
sentences.cn: 但是通常来说，一个与博客相关的混乱生命周期只有几天。 在整个博客范围作却非常注意不足和混乱。

sentences.en: There was a bit of a kerfuffle during the race when a dog impeded the leading runners.
sentences.cn: 比赛中一条狗干扰了领先的选手，引起一阵混乱。
这乱哄哄的是怎麽回事?
这乱哄哄的是怎么回事?
